title: typeface used for JAYSON HOME masthead
content:
seeking the typeface used in the logo for JAYSON HOME. it seems so familiar but basic searching have left me no where.

![JAYSON HOME](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015075525im_/http:/cdn.jaysonhome.com/skin/frontend/enterprise/jayson/images/logo.gif)
author: helloyellow

comments.content: it almost appears to be Copperplate outlined, but it's not quite the same. perhaps hand-tooled?
I think that would work since there are more weights. thank you!
you know, now as I look at it, the S is more similar to Copperplate. but Biondi is a great one, too!
